prontera,148,198,5	script	Vendedor	813,{
cutin "fey_fun",2;
	mes "[^FFA500Vendedor^000000]";
	mes "Hello! ^FF0000" + strcharinfo(0) + "^000000.";
	mes "Please select what you want";
	next;
	switch(select("^ff0000Sell it`s-Vender^000000:Armors:^008888Weapons/Armas^000000:^ff0000Ammunition^000000:Usables:Nothing")) {
	close2;
	
	case 1:
	callshop "sell", 2;
		end;
	
	case 2:
	switch(select("Armor:Shield:Footgear:Garments:Accessories")) {
		case 1:
		callshop "Armor", 1;
		end;
		
		case 2:
		callshop "Shield", 1;
		end;
		
		case 3:
		callshop "Footgear", 1;
		end;
		
		case 4:
		callshop "Garments", 1;
		end;
		
		
		case 5:
		callshop "Accessories", 1;
		end;
	}

	
	case 3:
	switch(select("Katars:Mace:Knuckle:Whips:Instruments:Books:Guns:Fuuma:One-Handed Swords:Two-Handed Swords:Spears:Dagger:Axes:Bows:Staffs")) {
		case 1:
		callshop "Katars", 1;
		end;
		
		case 2:
		callshop "Mace", 1;
		end;
		
		case 3:
		callshop "Knuckle", 1;
		end;
		
		case 4:
		callshop "Whips", 1;
		end;
		
		case 5:
		callshop "Instruments", 1;
		end;
		
		case 6:
		callshop "Books", 1;
		end;
		
		case 7:
		callshop "Guns", 1;
		end;
		
		case 8:
		callshop "Fuuma", 1;
		end;
		
		case 9:
		callshop "OneSwords", 1;
		end;
		
		case 10:
		callshop "TwoSwords", 1;
		end;
		
		case 11:
		callshop "Spears", 1;
		end;
		
		case 12:
		callshop "Dagger", 1;
		end;
		
		case 13:
		callshop "Axes", 1;
		end;
		
		case 14:
		callshop "Bows", 1;
		end;
		
		case 15:
		callshop "Staffs", 1;
		end;
	}

	
	case 4:
		callshop "Municiónes", 1;
		end;


	case 5:
	switch(select("Usables:Talisman:Pet Shop")){
		case 1:
		callshop "Usables", 1;
		end;	
		
		
		case 2:
		callshop "Talisman", 1;
		end;	
		
		case 3:
		callshop "PetShop", 1;
		end;	
	}
	case 6:
cutin "fey_nor",2;
	mes "[ Quick Mall ]";
	mes "Okay, back when you need me.";
	next;
		cutin "",255;
	close;
	}
OnInit:
	waitingroom "[All-in-one Dealer]",0;
	end;
}
// sell
-	shop	sell	-,504:-1
//shops
-	shop	Armor	-,2304:10000,2306:20000,2308:20000,2310:50000,2311:50000,2313:50000,2315:75000,2317:100000,2322:20000,2326:60000,2331:75000
